attributes.action: medical help and housing for ex service personal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: how can it be that a person who served Queen and Country from 3 years to 22 leave the sevice and when help is needed gets no help from anyone,but a person who comes from a country not commenwealth gets all the kit .a mate of mine did his time in the Army and when help is needed what happens a big zero.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
